thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 4 of 289
thread.title: Pam

author: Pam
title: Pam
text: I was a little nervous as I have never purchased from Ticket city and I was sorta expecting the worst cause I never bought tickets from a third party distributor. I did it though, slammed $300 down for Green Day pit tickets and was told they would come maybe 6 days before the concert. Needless to say they are sitting on my fridge(after purchasing maybe a week later and this was in January) counting down till September 5th. The transaction was painless, my anxiety sated and I will definitely purchase through here again. They even wished me a good time on the envelope! Very happy with the service.
